name: Follow The Stream
description:
Description

Follow The Stream is a Steam Punk Platformer with puzzle oriented levels. Developped for the Global Game Jam 2018 with the transmission theme, you will have to follow the stream transmitted through the pipes to progress through the levels.

Team

Cloé FRETILLET
Juliette GRUCHY
Arthur KNOEPFLIN
Corentin LEROY
Jérome LUTZ
Eliot MANN
Cedric THOMAS
